# === JavaScript ===
# AI-irrelevant files for JavaScript projects
# Generated by ainit.dev

# Dependencies
node_modules/

# Build output
dist/
build/
out/

# Bundled/minified files
*.min.js
*.min.css
*.bundle.js
*.chunk.js
*.map

# Lock files (large, no AI value)
package-lock.json
yarn.lock
pnpm-lock.yaml
bun.lockb

# Coverage & test output
coverage/
.nyc_output/

# Cache
.cache/
.parcel-cache/
.eslintcache

# Debug logs
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*
